titles.title: Veterans Health Care Budget Reform and Transparency Act of 2009

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize advance appropriations for certain medical care accounts of the Department of Veterans Affairs by providing two-fiscal year budget authority, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2232)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
2/12/2009--Introduced.
Veterans Health Care Budget Reform and Transparency Act of 2009 - Requires, beginning with FY2011, a two-fiscal-year new discretionary budget authority for the following accounts of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA): (1) Medical Services; (2) Medical Support and Compliance; and (3) Medical Facilities. Requires the Comptroller General to conduct a study on the adequacy and accuracy of VA baseline model projections for health care expenditures.
